Computer.name: UNKNOWN's Tool Server
Computer.file:
Here you will find my entire Executable collection free to access for any experienced hacker. I will be adding executables here from time to time, be sure to stop by every now and again for some new tools.
I have sorted each Exe into the Default Port Number they often crack. Sorry for the Proxy too, Often annoying for SCP'ing but it helps stops those pesky SPAM bots.
Assuming you got this far in the text file: You will also find a handy ThemeChanger file in the Home/Themes folder.
